==German== [[Image:Crystal Clear app date.png|thumb|Wochentag]] ===Etymology=== Compound word from {{compound|de|Woche|t1=week|Tag|t2=day}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈvɔχn̩ˌtaːk/}} * {{audio|de|De-Wochentag.ogg|audio}} * {{hyphenation|de|Wo|chen|tag}} ===Noun=== {{head|de|noun|g=m}} # [[weekday]] (any [[day of the week]]) # [[weekday]] (any [[day of the week]] except [[Sunday]]) =====Declension===== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|e}} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|wochentags}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:DWDS}} * {{R:Duden}}
